short_summary: Rohde & Schwarz Power Reflection Meter and Power Sensors
description: The Department of National Defence requires the following items: Rohde & Schwarz Power Reflection Meter Model NRT2, Rohde & Schwarz 19" rack Mount Adapter Model ZZA-KNA22, Rohde & Schwarz Power Sensor Model NRT-Z14, and Rohde & Schwarz Power Sensor Model NRT-Z44. Delivery is expected by January 31, 2024. Suppliers must be pre-qualified to submit bids. Note: The solicitation document is available for download from the CanadaBuys website.
tags: Electronic and communication measuring and testing instruments
full_summary:
